288722.「ふたりとも よく 来てくれた。\n ついに 天星郷にも 下界同様の\n 異変が:
Thank you both for coming. The strange goings
on of the lower world have finally made their
way to the Firmament.

288723.「天星郷の守りは かたいはず！\n いったい どうやって……。:
But the Firmament's defenses should be nigh
impenetrable! How could it...?

288724.「神にも等しい チカラを持つ 悪神ならば\n 造作もなかろう。みずからが 生みだ:
For a fiend with power rivaling that of a
god, it'd be quite easy. Ironic that they'd
bite the hand that fed them...

288725.「残る悪神は……アシュレイと レオーネ。\n どちらの しわざにせよ 動きだして:
The two remaining fiends are Ashley and Leone.
I'm relieved that they are finally making a
move, because I was getting tired of waiting.

288726.「今までの悪神とは 異なり\n 下界でなく 天星郷を 攻撃するだなんて\n 何を:
Unlike the other fiends we've encountered in
the lower world, they're attacking the
Firmament...what is their motive?

288727.「今は まだ なんとも……。\n わかってるのは 紺碧の試練場に\n 心域の入り:
We still don't know...all we do know is that
the entrance to their heartland has shown
itself inside the Azure Trial.

288728.「心域……悪神の心が 生みだす世界ですね。\n アシュレイか レオーネか……。\:
The heartland...a world created by the hearts of those fiends. Is it Ashley's, or Leone's...? I suppose we'll have to go and see
ourselves.

288729.「よい心意気だ。お前たち ふたりには\n 悪神の火種を回収するため 新たな心域に:
That's the spirit. I want you to investigate
this new heartland and secure the Fiend's
Kindle. Will you do it?

288730.「異変の発生源は 紺碧の試練場に建つ\n 創世のピラーと呼ばれる 塔のような建造:
The source of the anomaly this time is a
tower-like structure called the Pillar of
Creation, built in the Azure Trial.

288731.「この創世のピラーこそが\n 各々の試練場に エネルギーを供給する\n 施設と:
These Pillars of Creation are the facilities
that supply energy to the various trial
areas.

288732.「その最奥には 中心核と呼ばれる\n 膨大なエネルギーを生みだす 光る球体が\n:
In the deepest part, there is a floating, glowing sphere called the central core. It produces enormous amounts of energy...
and it's quite the beautiful sight to boot.

288733.「おっとっと すまん。話が それたな。\n じつは その創世のピラーの 入り口な:
Whoops, sorry. I'm getting off track here.
As it turns out, the entrance to that pillar
can only be accessed by those who can fly.

288735.「ああ 行けない。だから この際\n <pc>には 我々と同じように\n 空を飛:
Yeah, they can't go. That's why, I'd like them
to learn how to fly just like us.

288736.「天使でなくても 空を飛べるようになる\n 聖天のつばさ……という道具があってね:
There is a device called the "Wonderwing"
that will allow you fly even if you aren't an
angel.

288737.「まずは 深翠の試練場の 生誕の花園へ行き\n フェディーラから 聖天のつばさを:
First, go to the Garden of Growth in the Deep
Green Trial and get the Wonderwing from
Fedira. I've already filled her in.

288738.「空を飛べるようになったら ユーライザに\n 創世のピラーまで 導いてもらうとい:
Once you learn how to fly, Yuliza should be
able to lead you to the pillar.

288739.「戻ってきたか ふたりとも。\n 紺碧の試練場の異変は どうなった？:
You're back. So, what happened at the Azure
Trial?

288740.<pc>は アシュレイの\n呪炎の切り離しに 失敗して\n逃げられてしまったと:
<pc> explained that their attempt
to sever the cursed flame from Ashley had
failed, and that he had escaped.

288741.「どういうわけか アシュレイには\n 神剣が効かず 刀身にも ヒビが入って……。:
For some reason, the divine sword didn't work
on Ashley, and its blade cracked...

288742.「ふむ どれ……。見せてもらおうか。: Hmm, I see...please show it to me.

288743.「アシュレイの 並ならぬ胆力が\n 神剣のチカラを 跳ね返したのかもしれんな。:
I wonder if it was Ashley's extraordinary
courage that was able to deflect this blade.

288744.「呪炎を表出させつつも まだ 持ち直すだけの\n 余力があったのだろう。次に奴と:
He most likely had enough strength to recover even while harboring the cursed flame. Next time you fight him, make sure you really
shatter his spirit.

288745.「そうすれば 呪炎を切り離せるはずだ。\n 刀身にヒビが入り 刃こぼれも ひどい:
You should be able to sever it if you do that.
The blade is cracked and pretty dulled, but I
think it'll still work. You should be fine.

288746.「近いうちに 修復せねばならんが アシュレイを\n 倒すまでは これで 乗り切っ:
I'll have to eventually get it fixed, but this
should tide you over until you can take him
down.

288747.「それより 問題なのは 紺碧の試練場だな。\n アシュレイは 創世のピラーの奥で:
But more importantly, at the Azure Trial...
What was Ashley doing inside of the Pillar?

288748.「次の報告が まさに その件です。\n アシュレイは 中心核のエネルギーを\n:
That's just what I was about to tell you.
Ashley had some monster minions of his siphon
the central core's energy.

288749.「天井に浮かんでいる 光る球体が\n 見る間に しぼんでいって 小さくなり……。:
The floating sphere just got smaller and
smaller as I watched...

288750.「な なんだと！？ それを早く言え！\n ヘタすると 浮力を失い\n 紺碧の試練:
W...what did you say?! Why didn't you say so sooner?! If we don't stop that, the Azure Trial could lose its ability to float and come
crashing down!

288751.「前にも話したが 創世のピラーは 試練場を\n 維持するための エネルギーを生み:
As I told you before, the Pillars of Creation
generate energy to sustain the trial areas.
If that energy were to be taken away...

288752.「……かくなる上は 神都フォーリオンの\n 余剰エネルギーを 紺碧の試練場に回し:
...due to this situation, we'll have no choice
but to use Fourion's surplus energy and divert
some to the Azure Trial as an emergency.

288753.「この程度で とこしえの神殿の結界が\n 消えることは ないだろうが……。:
There should still be enough energy to keep
the wards of the Temple of Eternity active...

288754.「とこしえの神殿……フォーリオン外郭の\n 北にある 建物ですよね。あの古びた神:
The Temple of Eternity...that is the structure
to the north of Fourion, right? That old
temple is protected by a ward?

288755.「ああ。神代の遺構の次に 古い建物だからな。\n 天星郷の 歴史的な遺産なんだよ:
Yes. It's the second oldest structure, after the Ancient Remains. It's a historical legacy of the Firmament. If we fail to take proper
care of it, we won't hear the end of it from our ancestors.

288756.「それは さておき エネルギー関係のことは\n 専門外だしなぁ……。先代が くわ:
Aside from that...I'm not too well-versed in
matters relating to energy. My predecessor
knows more, so I'll go and ask him to help.

288757.「天使長。言づてなら 私たちが。: If that's what you need, then let us do it.

288758.「ん…そうか。なら お前たちに頼もう。: Hmm...I see. Then, I'll leave it to you two.

288759.「先代の天使長 ゲゼルマイン様に\n 神都の余剰エネルギーを 紺碧の試練場に\n:
Please ask Gezelmein, the previous Archangel,
if we can divert some of the city's surplus
energy to the Azure Trial.

288760.「先代は 神都の中層にある 南東の高台に\n 居を構えておられる。ミトラーの名代:
He resides in the southwestern part of the
city's middle area. If you say that Mitra sent
you, then he should let you in.

288761.「どうやら うまくいったようだね。\n なに……カオを見れば わかるよ。\n 先:
Looks like it worked. What...? I can tell by
the looks on your faces. So my predecessor
came to the rescue, did he?

288762.「はい。ゲゼルマイン様だけでなく\n クリュトス様にも 助けていただきました。:
That's right. Both Gezelmein and Krutos lent
us their help.

288763.「はっはっはっは！ クリュトスめ。\n 泡食って 制御室に 飛び込んできたのか。:
Hahaha! Oh, Krutos, Krutos...he came bursting
into the control room all angry, didn't he? My
predecessor would do the same thing...

288764.「おっと すまん すまん。\n なんとも 先代らしいなと 思ってな。\n 天使長:
Sorry, sorry. It's just so typical of him,
that's all. He was quite the odd one for being
an Archangel...

288765.「聖天舎の天使長は 数名の候補者から 投票で\n 選ばれるが……先代天使長の指名:
The Monastery's Archangel is chosen by vote amongst several candidates, but I was nominated as a candidate by the previous
Archangel, so I had a bit of an advantage.

288766.「私に 白羽の矢が立ったのは 天星郷の抱える\n とある 重要な課題を 解決に導:
I was proud to be chosen, since I had led the
Firmament to a solution in response to a very
critical issue.

288767.「ところが 私の功績は 先代しか知らぬ\n 機密事項ゆえ……あいつは くじ引きで:
But my achievements remained confidential, known only to the previous Archangel...and then rumors began to spread that he did
his selection via a lottery...

288768.「不安になり 真偽を確かめるため 先代を\n 問い詰めたのだが はぐらかされるば:
It worried me, so I asked him to tell me the
truth. He kept dodging my questions, so I
never did learn what really happened...

288769.「本当に くじで決まったのかもな……ははっ。\n くじ運だけの とんだ ラッキー:
Maybe it really was just all luck, haha... A
lucky girl from the luck of the draw...

288771.「ミトラー様が 天使長になられたことは\n 天星郷にとって ラッキーな人選でした:
You becoming Archangel was a very fortunate
choice, you know! Everyone was overjoyed at
the time!

288773.「まあ 皆に ラッキーだったと\n 思ってもらえるよう がんばろうかな。\n 先:
Well, I'll just do my best to make everyone
feel lucky, and avoid tarnishing my
predecessor's reputation!

288774.「大変です！ 天使長！\n 黄金の試練場に 心域が出現しました！:
This is bad! Archangel, a heartland has
appeared at the Golden Trial!

288775.「あなた方も いらしてたのですか。\n それなら 話が早い。:
Oh, so you're here, too? That makes things
quicker.

288776.「新たな心域が 現れたのは 創世のピラーか？:
Has the heartland appeared within the Pillar
of Creation?

288777.「ええ。紺碧の試練場と 同様です。\n 急ぎ 悪神を討伐しなければ 黄金の中心核:
Yes, just like the Azure Trial. If we don't
stop that fiend quickly, it will drain the
core's energy.

288778.「急がねば ならんな……黄金の試練場にある\n 輝きの草原の 創世のピラーに向か:
You must hurry to the Pillar located in the
Golden Trial's Shining Meadow. Be sure to
really stop Ashley this time around.

288875.「えっ 心域を抜けた……？: What? Have we left the heartland...?

288876.「光る球体が 浮いてる……。\n これが 天使長の言っていた 試練場の\n エネ:
That floating sphere...is that not the device
the Archangel mentioned that generates
energy for the trial areas?

288877.「なんだよ 来るの早すぎだろ！\n もっと ゆっくり 味わうように\n 見てって:
Hey, hey...you're here way too soon!
Shoulda' taken your time and savored it
a little more!

288878.「おーし たらふく 食ったようだな。\n レオのもとに 帰りな。:
Good. Looks like you've had your fill.
Go on back to Leo now.

288879.「試練場の エネルギーを奪って\n 何をやろうと しているんです！？:
What are you planning on doing with that
energy?!

288880.「フン！ 教えてやる義理なんざ\n これっぽっちも ねえや。聞けば なんでも\n:
Hmph! I don't even have the slightest
obligation to tell you anything! Don't think
you'll get an answer just 'cause you ask!

288881.「そんなことより <cs_pchero>。\n まだ 俺が見せたいものの 半分し:
But that's not the point. <cs_pchero>.
You've only seen half of what I wanted to show
you. How about a temporary truce, yeah?

288882.「全部を 見届けた上で 俺とレオの\n 同志になるか お前に判断してほしい。\n:
I want you to see the whole thing 'till the end, and then decide if you wanna join up with me and Leo. It's important, so I don't
want to leave it just halfway.

288883.「どんなものを 見せられようと\n この人は 悪神の同志には なりません！:
No matter what you show to <if_woman>her<else>him<endif>,
<if_woman>she<else>he<endif> will never join with a fiend!

288884.「……仕方ねえ。ここまで言って わからねえなら\n 一度 たたきのめして 言うこ:
Guess there's no convincing you...if you STILL don't get it after everything I've told you, then I'll just have to beat it into you!
That's what champions do, after all!

288885.「……かなわねえなぁ。\n 当代の盟友は こんなにも 強いのか。\n 勇者をも:
I guess I'm no match for you...the present-day
Ally is really this strong, huh... Even
stronger than a Hero...

288886.「今です！ 神剣で呪炎を！: Now! Use the sword on the cursed flame!

288887.「まだだ！ 一度 負けたくらいじゃ\n 勇者は 屈しないッ！:
I'm not...done yet! A Hero doesn't give in

288889.「俺はよぉ こんなとこで\n やられるわけにゃあ いかねえんだ！:
I'm not gonna let you beat me here!
No way!

288890.「レオの奴が お前を気に入っててさ。\n 兄ちゃんとしては なんとしても\n 弟:
That Leo really likes you, you know. As a big
brother, he's probably gonna try his best to
make his little brother happy, yeah?

288891.「そんなわけだからよぉ！\n ここは いったん 退かせてもらうぜ！:
So that's why...I'm gonna have to retreat
for now!

288892.「刀身にヒビが……。これまでの悪神なら\n 一撃のもとに 呪炎を切り離せたのに\:
The blade is cracked... It was able to sever the curse easily from the previous fiends we've encountered, but... Ashley is just on
a whole different level...

288893.「今は 一度 聖天舎に戻り\n この件もふくめて 天使長に報告しましょう。:
I think we should take this opportunity to
return to the Monastery and report everything
to the Archangel.

288894.「ゲゼルマイン様の おっしゃっていた\n 端末というのは これでしょうか……。\:
Is this the terminal Gezelmein was talking
about...? Oh, that's right...he did leave us
with a note, didn't he.

288895.「えーと……まず 端末にくっついた ハンドルを\n 右回りに回転させれば 神都フ:
Let's see... "First, if you rotate the
terminal's wheel clockwise, you can release
Fourion's energy..."

<pc> tried turning the wheel

they budged, it wouldn't budge at all...

288898.「……どうしました？ 目の前のハンドルを \n 右回りに 回転させるだけですよ。:
What are you doing...? All you have to do is
turn the wheel clockwise.

288899.ハンドルを回転させ 神都フォーリオンの\nエネルギーを解放しますか？\n<sel:

288900.<pc>は ハンドルを右回りに回転させ\n神都フォーリオンのエネルギーを 解放し:
<pc> turned the wheel clockwise,
releasing Fourion's energy!

288901.「うまくいったようです！\n やりましたね <pc>！:
Looks like that worked! Nice job,
<pc>!

288902.「ん？ メモには 続きがあるようです……。\n しばらく待つと クリュトスが来る:
Hmm? There's more to the note... "Wait a short
while for Krutos to come, and follow his
instructions once he does..."

288903.「はて？ ここで どうして\n クリュトス様の お名前が…………？: Huh? Why is Krutos' name mentioned here...?

288904.「あなたたちッ！！\n そこで 何をやっているのです！: Hey, you! What do you think you're doing?!

288906.<pc>は クリュトスに 紺碧の試練場の\nエネルギー不足のため 先代天使長の指:
explained to Krutos that due to the Azure Trial losing energy, they followed the instructions of the previous
Archangel and released the city's energy.

288907.「はぁ……ゲゼルマイン様も 困ったものですね。\n 昔から あきれるほどの 面倒:
*sigh*... That Gezelmein, what a pain...
Always the lazy one, he is...

288908.「とはいえ ゲゼルマイン様の\n 一番弟子を 名乗るからには\n 協力しないわけ:
However, if I'm to call myself his number one
disciple, then I can't refuse to cooperate,
can I...

288909.「ゲゼルマイン様のメモにも\n 書いてあったのですが\n クリュトス様は どうし:
It was written in his note that you would
come here, but why ARE you here, anyways?

288910.「天星郷全体の エネルギーの流れに\n 異常を 検知したからです。\n 正面のカ:
It's all because we detected a problem with
the flow of energy throughout the Firmament.
Take a look at the wall there.

288911.「中央の光る水晶が 神都フォーリオンで\n その周辺に 配置された水晶は\n 各:
The glowing crystal in the center is the city
itself, while the crystals placed around the
outside are the various trial areas.

288912.「光の線が 上に伸びてるでしょう？\n これは 神都のエネルギーが 北にある\n:
See the trail of light going upward? That
means that the city's energy is being fed into
the Temple of Eternity to the north.

288913.「さっき あなたたちが やったのは\n 神都のエネルギーを すべての試練場に\n:
What you did just now was a procedure to
release the city's energy into all of the
trial areas.

288914.「エネルギーが足りてる 試練場にまで\n 過剰なエネルギーが 流れ込み\n その:
Excess energy was flowing into the trial areas
that already had enough, and that excess
could cause some issues.

288915.「紺碧の試練場にだけ エネルギーを\n 供給したいなら まず 端末に\n 専用の:
If you want to divert energy to only the Azure
Trial, you'll first need to integrate a
special control device into this terminal.

288916.「たしか 作りかけの物が\n 倉庫にあったはず……少々 お待ちを。:
I believe there should be a partially made
one somewhere in storage...please wait here
for just a moment.

288917.「これは 分光器といって 対象を選んで\n エネルギーを制御するための 器具なん:
This here is a Spectrometer. It's a device
that can control the energy of a selected
target. However, it's inactive right now...

288918.「でも 分光器の 内部にある水晶を\n 振動により 活性化させれば 起動できます:
But if you vibrate the crystal inside of it,
you'll be able to activate it. Here, please
take this...

288920.「分光器を持った状態で フォーリオン造成地の\n 北東の浮島などに 生息している:
While holding that, defeat three Spirit Flames
that dwell on the northeastern floating island
in the Fourion Worksite.

288921.「スピリットフレイムの放つ\n 生体エネルギーの波長が 分光器の水晶を\n 振動:
The bioenergy wavelengths that those spirits
emit can vibrate the Spectrometer's crystal,
making it operational.

288922.「造成地の 北東の浮島などにいる\n スピリットフレイムを ３匹ですね？\n 急:
Three Spirit Flames on the northeastern
floating island, right? Let's hurry and get
it over with.

288923.「クリュトス様。ご指示どおり\n 分光器を 再起動させました。:
We've reactivated the Spectrometer just as
you asked.

288924.「ありがとうございます。\n では 分光器を こちらに。: Thank you! Please bring it here.

288926.「……感謝のエネルギーだけでなく\n クリュトス様は フォーリオン全体の\n エ:
You sure know quite a lot about the entirety
of Fourion's energy, and not just Gratituity,
right?

288927.「ヘルヴェルお姉様にしても 戦技に優れた方だし\n 審判の天使になる方々は どな:
Helvel is an excellent fighter, too...each of
the Angels of Judgment seem to have
exceptional strengths...

288928.「ずば抜けた長所……ですか。ふふっ。\n じつは 何もかも ただの偶然なんですよ:
Exceptional strengths...? Heh heh. To be
honest, it's just a matter of coincidence.

288929.「昔 商人に扮して 下界を視察してきた\n 先代から 大量のゴールドを\n 押し:
I was visiting the lower world as a disguised
merchant, and was burdened with quite the
large sum of Gold from my predecessor...

288930.「先代が言うには 天使には ただの金属の塊でも\n 下界の民にとって ゴールドは:
They told me that Gold is nothing but just a piece of metal to us angels, but to those of the lower world, it's something precious,
filled with many thoughts and feelings...

Firmament!

289053.「もし また お姉様が暴走したなら\n 私たちが全力で止めます。たとえ それで\:
If she loses control again, we'll do
everything in our power to stop her. Even if
it means taking her life.

289054.「……仕方ない。ヘルヴェルの同行を \n 許可する。神剣の修復 急げよ。:
I suppose I've no other choice...I will allow
Helvel to accompany you. Waste no time
in repairing the sword.

289055.「フフ…言うようになったな ユーライザ。\n おかげで 外の空気が吸える。:
Hehe...you've become quite outspoken,
Yuliza. Thanks to you, I'll be able to get
some fresh air.

289056.「神剣を 修復するための 装置だが\n 白灰の試練場の中心核の間に しまってある:
The device used to repair the sword is hidden
away inside the central core of the White
Ash Trial.

289057.「それなら 白灰の試練場の 試みの荒野にある\n 創世のピラーの根元から 入れま:
So we can get there from the base of the
Pillar in the Wilderness of Trials, right?
Let's be on our way.

289058.「これが 聖天のレンズだ。４つの試練場の\n 創世のピラーを 生成したときに使っ:
This is the Divine Lens. It was used to build
the Pillars of Creation in the four trial
areas. It's also one of Lutiana's treasures.

289059.「時間は かかるが 本体よりも\n はるかに巨大な物を 生みだせる。\n 無論:
It takes some time, but it can create a much
larger version of something put into it. Of
course, even something small like a sword.

289060.「ルティアナ様は こんな すばらしい物を\n 天星郷に 残してくださったのですね:
To think Lutiana left such an incredible thing
for us here in the Firmament...

289061.「聖天のレンズだけではない。\n アストルティアの楯も また\n ルティアナ様が:
Not only the Divine Lens. Lutiana also
created the Shield of Astoltia.

289063.「……奇妙な物言いだな。\n アストルティアの楯は この世界を守護する\n 大結:
What a strange thing to say...I've heard that
the shield is a hidden treasure that creates
a gigantic ward to protect this world.

289064.「だからこそ 神殿の奥に まつられ\n その存在すらも 一部の者をのぞいて\n:
That's why it's hidden deep inside the Temple,
and its existence is only know to a select
few.

289065.「まあ 私も 実物を見たことは ないがな……。\n 楯が奉納されている とこしえ:
Well, I've also never seen it, but...the
Temple of Eternity is protected by a very
strong ward, so no one can enter.

289066.「でも 今は 結界が解かれてます。: But now the ward has been lifted.

289068.「楯が 狙われているにせよ エネルギー不足に\n おちいった 試練場を維持するた:
Even though the shield was the target, it was necessary to lower the ward in order to supply energy to the trial areas that were being
siphoned...

289069.「代わりに 天使長は みずから\n 神殿の防衛に 向かわれました。:
So, instead, the Archangel went to the Temple
to protect it herself.

289070.「天使長ならば 悪神とも\n 互角に 渡り合えるだろうが……。\n これは 急い:
The Archangel is strong enough to be evenly
matched with those fiends, but...I think we'd
better hurry.

289071.「<pc>。聖天のレンズに向かって\n 神剣を かかげてくれ。:
<pc>. Please hold up the sword to
the Divine Lens, if you would.

289072.「たとえ 壊れた物であっても\n 聖天のレンズが 完璧に再生してくれよう。:
No matter the object, even if it is broken,
the Lens will repair it.

289073.「これなら すぐにでも\n 天使長の応援に 向かえますね！！:
With this, we can quickly go to the aid of
the Archangel!

289074.「……そうカンタンには いかないようだ。\n 神剣レクタリスの 再生には\n レ:
I suppose it's not that easy... To repair the
sword, we will need four pieces of Lecta
Ore.

289075.「どこで 手に入るんです？\n 私たちが 急いで採ってきます。:
Where can we find it? We'll go and get some
right away.

289076.「……ふたりで行く気か？\n カンティスに ああ言った手前\n 私を ひとりにし:
You two are going alone...? After what you
said to Kantis, I don't think it's a good idea
to leave me all alone.

289077.「すまないが ここは お前に頼むとしよう。\n これに レクタ鉱石を入れてきてく:
I'm sorry, but I'll have to ask you to do this
by yourself. Please put the Lecta Ore you
find inside of this.

289079.「レクタ鉱石は フォーリオン造成地で採れる。\n 採り方は メドナムという天使を:
You can find the ore in the Fourion Worksite.
Speak to an angel named Mednam there
and he'll tell you how to find it.

289080.「お帰りなさい <pc>。\n レクタ鉱石 採れたみたいですね。:
<pc>, you're back. I can see you
had no problems gathering the ore.

289081.「ご苦労だった。聖天のレンズの前で\n 鉱石の入ったバッグを かかげてくれ。:
You've done well. Please hold the bag of
ore up to the Lens.

289082.「一瞬で 完成というわけには\n いかないようですね……。:
I suppose it's something that is going to
take some time...

289083.「……ジア・クトとは なんなのです？\n クリュトス様も カンティス様も\n 禁:
...what exactly is Dia Kut? Both Krutos and
Kantis said that name was forbidden...

289085.「お前たちは 知っておくべきだろうな。\n この身は すでに 罪にまみれている。:
It's about time you both knew. I'm
already tainted with sin, so I might as well
break another rule.

289086.「ユーライザ。我らの祖先が\n とこしえのゆりかごと呼ばれる 旧き世界より\n:
Yuliza...you do know that our ancestors
escaped from a place known as the Eternal
Cradle, don't you?

289087.「はい。たしか 遠い遠い昔に\n 大災害にみまわれて 脱出してきたんですよね？:
That's right. Everyone escaped from a horrible
catastrophe a very long time ago, right?

289088.「その 大災害の元凶が\n ジア・クト念晶体と呼ばれる 侵略者……。\n 祖先の:
The source of that catastrophe was something called the Dia Kut Telecrystal...they are the beings that laid waste to our ancestor's
homeland.

289089.「今は 神代の遺構と呼ばれる かつての神都に\n ジア・クトの爪痕が 残されてい:
Now called the Ancient Remains, the former
city still bears the scars from Dia Kut.

289090.「あそこに漂う 猛毒の赤い霧は\n ジア・クトによるものだ。数万年もの\n 時を:
The poisonous red mist is a result of that.
Even after tens of thousands of years, it
still lingers there.

289091.「アルビデを 支配するのに使った石や\n 悪神の火種は 神代の遺構の 赤い霧が漂:
The stone that controlled Albide and the
Fiend's Kindles...these things were only able
to grow in the presence of that mist...

289092.「お姉様は 収穫した悪神の火種を\n レオーネに渡したと 言ってましたよね？\n:
You said that you gave the harvested Fiend's
Kindles to Leone, right? Could his true
identity actually be this Dia Kut?

289093.「そう 早まるものではないよ。つい 最近\n 肉体を得たばかりのレオーネが すべ:
We shouldn't jump to conclusions. There's no
way Leone could've possibly orchestrated all
of this in the short time he's had a body.

289094.「ほかにも 協力者がいたとか……。: Perhaps there were others helping him...?

289095.「今の揺れ……イヤな予感がしますね。\n レオーネが 動きだしたのでは……。:
That shaking...I have a bad feeling about
this. I think Leone might be taking action...

289096.「奴が とこしえの神殿を\n 強襲したのかも しれん。:
He may have infiltrated the Temple of
Eternity.

289097.「ふたりは とこしえの神殿へ行き\n 天使長を お助けしろ。:
Both of you, go to the Temple and help the
Archangel.

289098.「そんな！ まだ 神剣が\n 直っていないのに。:
We can't! The sword still hasn't been repaired
yet!

289099.「今は 一刻も早く 加勢に向かうべきだ。\n レオーネは これまでの悪神と 何か:
We have to act fast and lend our aid right
now. Leone is different from the other fiends,
and we can't leave anything to chance.

289100.「神剣は 完成しだい 必ず届ける。\n 私を信じてくれ。:
As soon as the sword is finished, I swear I
will bring it to you. Please trust me.

289103.<pc>と ユーライザは\n資材倉庫を出て 白灰の試練場を後にし\nフォーリオン:
<pc> and Yuliza exited the storage
and left the White Ash Trials, heading for
outer Fourion.

289104.「奥に見えるのが とこしえの神殿です。\n 天使長たちが 守りを固めているので\:
The Temple is that way. The Archangel and the
others are guarding it, so even Leone won't be
able to get inside so easily...

289106.「とこしえの神殿に通じる 転送の門は\n 外郭の北側。ちょうど ここから\n 見:
The Relay Gate leading to the Temple is on
the outer wall's north side. You can see it
from here. Come on, let's hurry!

289109.「そうです。戦務室の精鋭で 守りを固めれば\n 防ぎきれると 踏んでいたのですが:
That's right...I thought our defenses could be
fortified with our elite soldiers, but he was
stronger than we could possibly imagine...

289110.「……天使長は 神殿の最奥にある\n 楯を奉納した部屋を 死守してます。\n 僕:
The Archangel is guarding the room where the
Shield is being held, deep inside the
Temple... We have to go after Leone...

289111.「ムチャしないでください！\n 私たちで 行きますから。:
Please don't push yourselves any further!
The two of us will go.

289112.「おふたりは 負傷した者たちを連れ\n 聖天舎へ お戻りください。:
You two should return to the Monastery with
the wounded.

289113.「ふがいない 審判の天使で 申し訳ない。\n ですが 頼みます。楯が 壊されでも:
I apologize for my incompetence as an Angel of Judgment. But please, I beg you. If the Shield were to be destroyed, there's no
telling the disaster that would follow.

289114.「わかっています。\n ジア・クトの 脅威ですよね？:
I understand. From the threat of Dia Kut,
right?

289116.「私からも お願いします。この奥でレオーネと\n 戦っている天使長に 加勢してく:
I beg you to do the same. Please help the
Archangel with fighting Leone, and please
protect the Shield of Astoltia.

289118.「あの石像は レオーネの……？\n ここに来て またも\n 心域に はばまれるな:
Is that a statue of Leone...? To come here
and be trapped inside of a heartland once
again...I was not expecting this.

289119.「どうやら 何か しかけがあるようです。\n 先に進みたければ 解くしかなさそう:
There seems to be some kind of mechanism
here. If we're to proceed, we'll have to
figure out how it works.

289120.「ひとりでは 分が悪かろう。\n おとなしく アストルティアの楯を渡すなら\n:
It's not wise to be by your lonesome. Quietly
hand over the Shield of Astoltia, and I'll
allow you to live.

289121.「あれを 奪われれば\n アストルティアは 滅んだも同然だ！:
If I let you have it, then Astoltia is as good
as gone!

289122.「そうか。ならば ここで死ぬんだな。: I see...then this is where you die.

289123.「もう 追いついたのか。\n 予想より だいぶ 早かったな。:
So you've already caught up, have you...
You were much quicker than I anticipated.

289125.「……こんな奴の相手を\n しているヒマなど ないというのに！:
I don't have time to deal with the likes of
you!

289126.「<cs_pchero>！ 速攻で 倒しましょう！:
<cs_pchero>! Let's make quick work
of them!

289128.「神剣でないと ダメだというの……？: So only the divine sword can defeat it...?

289131.「間に合って よかった。: Thank goodness I made it in time.

289133.「……悪神の火種です。\n レオーネは これで 手下の魔物を\n 強化していたよ:
A Fiend's Kindle... Leone must've used them
to strengthen those monster minions he was
controlling.

289134.「手下か……。レオーネとの決着は\n まだ ついてないようだな。\n ここから先:
Minions, you say... It seems that your battle
with Leone is not yet over. I'll lend you a
hand.

289135.「そんな！ まだ 戦えるような身体では……。:
You mustn't! You're in no condition to
fight...

289136.「……汚名返上の 機会をくれ。\n アルビデを 死なせてしまったことへの\n つ:
Give me this chance to clear my name. It's my
way of making amends for Albide's death.

289231.「創世のピラーには 審判の天使以外\n 立ち入りを 禁じられており\n 私も 中:
The Pillars of Creation are forbidden to all
except the Angels of Judgment, so this is
the first time I've been inside one.

289232.「さっそく 心域に入ったようですね……。\n アシュレイ レオーネ……いったい:
Looks like we've already entered the heartland
of...Ashley...? Leone...? Which one of yours
is it?

289233.「それに あの人たち……いえ 人形？: And those people...no, are they dolls...?

289234.「ようこそ 我が心域に。\n お前たちが来るのを 待ちわびたぞ。:
Welcome to my heartland. We have been
expecting you.

289235.「あー 待て 待て。\n ムダな体力を使うのは よしたほうがいい。\n 今 見え:
Ah, hang on, hang on! I wouldn't waste your
energy. What you're seeing now is just an
illusion. I-llu-sion!

289236.「わざわざ こんな おもてなしをするのは\n お前に 生前の俺を 知ってほしいか:
The reason I'm going out of my way to be all
hospitable is 'cuz I want you to know what
I was like before I died.

289237.「この先 起こることを よ～く見て お前には\n 俺とレオーネの 同志になっても:
I want you to watch reeeeal careful what's
about to happen next, and become comrades
with me and Leone.

289238.「よくも ぬけぬけと！ <pc>が\n 悪神の一味に 加わるようなことなど\n:
How dare you?! You're crazy if you think
<pc> will join together with
a fiend!

289239.「ハン！ あんたが どんなに ほえようと\n 俺を倒したかったら 心域の先まで\:
Hmph! No matter how much you talk, you'll have
to go all the way to the depths of my heart to
defeat me! While seeing my past!

289240.「てなわけで 初代勇者の昔話の 始まり始まり～\n 遠い遠い昔 レンダーシアの:
And so begins the tale of the first Hero from
long, long ago...in a place called Lendersia,
there existed two tribes: Zedra and Reviewle.

289241.「俺とレオーネは ゼドラ族の 族長の子として\n 生まれたんだが しあわせな子供:
Leone and I were born as children of the
Zedra tribe's chief, but our happy childhood
came to a skidding halt...just like this.

289243.「アシュレイも レオーネも\n 腹を痛めて産んだ 大切な我が子。\n どちらかを:
Both Ashley and Leone are my precious children
born after much hardship. You can't seriously
suggest putting one up for adoption, can you?!

289244.「お前が生んだ勇者は 双子であった。\n 部族の均衡を はかるため どちらかを\:
The Hero you gave birth to has a twin. In order to balance both tribes, one must be adopted into the Reviewle tribe. This is a
divine decree.

289245.「双方が 勇者を いただくようになれば\n いさかいの絶えぬ レビュール族と\n:
If both sides are to accept both Heroes, there
may finally be hope of reconciliation between
the ever-feuding Zedra and Reviewle.

289246.「部族のため！ ひいては 人類のため！\n すべては グランゼニス神の導きのまま:
It is for our tribe, and ultimately for all of
humanity! All under the guidance of the
great Gran Zenith...

289247.「この巫女の ばあさんのせいで\n まだ 幼かった 俺とレオーネは\n 離れ離れ:
Thanks to this old maiden, Leone and I were
separated at a very young age.

289248.「巫女ってのは 大魔王が襲ってくるとか\n 勇者が生まれるとか……そういう\n:
A maiden is supposed to announce the prophecies of the gods to everyone...like when the Demon Lord is supposed to attack or when
a Hero will be born, for example.

289249.「俺とレオを 引き離すのも 神の預言である\n とか 言われりゃあ 逆らえる奴な:
When she claimed it was a prophecy to separate
me from Leo, there wasn't a single person who
could object...

289250.「これを機に レオは レビュール族の\n 族長の家に 預けられちまった。\n 俺:
As a result, Leo was sent to live with the
Reviewle's chief. I was raised here with the
Zedra tribe.

289251.「まだ このころは レオーネも\n 勇者と 呼ばれてたんだっけ……。:
Leone was still called a Hero back then too,
wasn't he...

289252.「<pc>。俺は 心域の先で待ってる。\n そのときに もう一度 同志になるか\:
. I'll be waiting further inside this heartland. That's when I'll ask you again if you wanna be my comrade or
not.

289253.「自身の記憶を 見せていくことで\n あなたを 取り込もうとするなんて……。\n:
The way he's trying to get you to join him by
showing you his own memories...none of the
other fiends have done anything like this.

289254.「……不可解ですが\n 今は 先へ進むとしましょう。:
It's quite baffling, but...
For now, let's just move on.

289255.「遅い！ 私を待たせるな！: Too slow! You shouldn't keep me waiting!

289256.「……レオは レビュールの集落から\n 通ってんだぞ 師匠。ちょっとくらい\n:
Leo has to come all the way from Reviewle's
village... Don't go off scolding us just
'cause we're a little late.

289257.「実戦なら 死んでいたぞ。\n 大魔王に 言い訳など通じぬ！:
If this were a real fight, you'd be dead!
The Demon Lord doesn't care about your
excuses!

289258.「実戦なら 死んでたぜ 師匠。:
If this were a real fight, you'd be dead,
Master.

289259.「フン！ ついに このガーニハンから\n １本 取りおったか。:
Hmph! Looks like you were finally able to
best me just once...

289260.「おお 参られたか。どうぞ こちらに。: Oh, you're here! Please, come this way.

289261.「勇者アシュレイに 勇者レオーネ。\n お初に お目にかかります。:
Ashley and Leone, the two Heroes...
It's a pleasure to meet you both.

289262.「巫女見習いの ダフィアと申します。\n 本日より 修練に参加させていただきます:
My name is Dafia, and I am a maiden
apprentice. I will be joining your training
starting today, so I hope we can get along.

289263.「ダフィア様は 次代の巫女として 長年\n ソーラリア峡谷のグランゼニス宮で 過:
As part of the next generation of maidens, Dafia has spent many years at Gran Zenith's Palace in the Solaria Canyon, studying hard
to master her spiritual ability.

289264.「呪文のウデ前も 相当なものだ。\n 大魔王討伐のおりには 頼もしい戦力として\:
Her skill with spells is also commendable.
She will be a valuable asset to us in
defeating the Demon Lord.

289265.「本当に そっくりですのね。\n 私 双子を見るのは 初めてで。:
They really do look alike...
This is the first time I've ever seen twins.

289269.「まだ 道が続いてるようです。\n 先へ 進んでみましょう。:
It looks like we still have a ways to go.
Let's keep going.

289270.「……いよいよだな。\n ここから先は 死出の旅路。:
It's finally here... From here on, it'll be
a journey of life or death.

289271.「景気ワリィこと 言うなよ。\n 大魔王を倒して 帰ってくんだろ？:
Why do you gotta be so negative? You're gonna
defeat the Demon Lord and come back, right?

289272.「この陣地を築くのにも 多くの犠牲を払った。\n 大魔王が根城とする ドラクロン:
Many lives were sacrificed to build this stronghold. The Demon Lord's fortress in the Draklon Mountains is bound to have even
stronger defenses...

289273.「たとえ 道半ばで果てようと\n 人助けこそ お前たちの 本分であろう。:
"Even if we meet our end halfway through,
helping others is our true purpose."

289274.「なぜなら 勇者なのだから……ってか？\n 先代巫女の クチぐせだったな。\n:
"Because you are Heroes..." The last maiden used to say that, didn't she? If we die, does that mean we're free from all this
responsibility?

289275.「だから そう 悲観的になるなって。\n お前の悪いクセだ。気楽にいこうぜ。\n:
You shouldn't get all pessimistic now. That's
your bad habit, you know. Let's just take it
easy and go hunting in the mountains.

289276.「なら 準備は しっかり ととのえませんとね。:
Then...we should make sure we're well
prepared.

289277.「おう。アンタからも 言ってやってくれ。\n レオが 景気ワリィこと 言ってんだ:
Hey. You should talk to him, too. Leo's acting
all gloomy, like he's on a one-way trip to
death. It's a real drag, ya know.

289278.「現実的な分析 だろ？: It's just being realistic, you know?

289279.「レオーネの 言うように\n 勝ち目は うすいかもしれません。:
As Leone says...our odds of success may be
slim.

289281.「ですが 加護を得れば 勝算も上がりましょう。\n おふたりに お守りを用意しま:
But your chances should improve with my
blessing. I've prepared a charm for the both
of you. Please take them.

289283.「感謝するぜ！ でもよ グランゼニス神の\n 加護だったら 期待できねえぞ。\n:
Thanks a bunch! But if it's a blessing from
Gran Zenith, I wouldn't hold my breath...
He's snoozing somewhere, isn't he?

289284.「神の加護ではなく 私の加護です。\n 手作りですから。:
It's not his blessing, it's mine. I made it
all by myself.

289285.「ガーニハン様も お守りをどうぞ。:
Master Ganihan, I'd like you to take a charm
too.

289286.「ふむ いただきましょう。: Of course. I'd be happy to.

289287.「師匠にも あるのかよ！: There's one for the Master too?!

289288.「ずいぶん ほほえましい 記憶ですね。\n けれど 内容からして この次は\n:
Quite the heartwarming memory, don't you agree? But from what we've seen already, it looks like the battle with the Demon Lord is
coming next...

289289.「アシュレイの思惑に 乗せられているようで\n シャクですが……そこで 何があっ:
It feels like we're just being strung along
with Ashley's plan, but...I am still curious
to see what's to happen.

289290.「大魔王ゴダ！！ てめえの命\n 散っていった同胞の たむけにしてやる！:
Demon Lord Goda! I'll make sure you pay
dearly for the lives of our fallen comrades!

289291.「アストルティアに 攻めてきたのが\n てめえの運の尽きだ！:
Your luck ran out as soon as you decided to
invade Astoltia!

289293.「わかってないだ……？\n 魔族の事情なんか 知るか。:
Understand nothing...? Like I care what a
demon thinks!

289294.「闇の深淵にうごめく 始源のかいなよ……\n 今こそ 我に チカラをっ！！:
The origin of darkness itself, the Great Abyss
of Darkness that stirs...
Give your power to me!!

289295.「……アストルティアの民に\n 魔界の怒りと怨念を 知らしめるため\n 勇者には:
The people of Astoltia shall know the wrath
and hatred of the Demon World...and its
Hero shall lead the charge.

289298.「全員を道連れにしようとは 欲張りだな。\n 老いぼれの命だけで がまんせい。:
You got too greedy, wanting to take everyone
along. You'll just have to make do with this
old man's life.

289300.「……つかの間の平和を 楽しむがいい。\n いつの日か 我に続く 第二 第三の大:
Enjoy your temporary peace while it still lasts... One day, a second or even third Demon Lord will take my place, and threaten this
land once more.

289302.「レ レオーネ！？\n おい ウソだろ……どういうことだ！\n なんだって こん:
L...Leone?! Hey, this can't be...what is going
on?! How could this happen...?!

289304.「ええ……黒い手のような物から\n レオーネが 守ってくれたのです。:
Yes...Leone protected me from something that
looked like a black hand.

289305.「俺らが助かって なんで レオだけが……。: But why were we saved, and Leo was...

289306.「死にぎわの 大魔王の言葉からして\n 呪い……かもしれません。:
Perhaps it's a curse...judging from the Demon
Lord's dying words...

289307.「勇者に呪いあれ…ってやつか。\n じゃあ なんで 俺だけ無事なんだ？\n ワケ:
He said "A curse upon you, Hero", didn't he?
Then why am I the only one who was left
untouched...? This makes no sense...

289308.「……痛ましい光景でしたが\n 英雄と呼ばれるほどの者は 誰しも\n 親しい者の:
What a tragic scene...but anyone who's ever
been called a Hero has had to endure the death
of someone close to them.

289309.「アシュレイともあろう者が その痛みを\n 克服できなかったとは 思いがたい……:
It's hard to believe that someone of Ashley's
demeanor wasn't able to overcome that pain...

289310.「ん……まだ 先があるようですね。\n 気をつけて進みましょう <pc>。:
Mmm...looks like we've still a ways to go.
Let's proceed with care.

289311.「あの石像……もしや 大魔王との戦いで\n 石にされてしまった レオーネでしょう:
That statue...could that be Leone who was
turned into stone during the battle with
Goda?

289312.「母上……また このような場所に。\n 夜は冷えます。お部屋に お戻りください。:
Mother...you're here again? You know that it
gets very cold at night. Please go back to
your room.

289313.「お前のほうこそ こんな冷たい場所に\n 弟を置いておいて なんとも 思わぬのか:
Don't you think at all about leaving
him in such a cold place?! Leone is
your brother!

289314.「強力な 解呪のチカラを持つとされる\n 巫女の秘薬さえ 効き目がなかった……。:
Even the maiden's medicine, powerful enough
to break the curse, didn't work...

289315.「なんて 不憫な子だろう……。\n 養子になんか 出したばっかりに。:
That poor child...I can't believe I gave him
up for adoption...

289317.「失礼ながら……養子といえども\n 義弟は レビュール族の 族長の子として\n:
With all due respect...despite being adopted, my younger brother was raised equally alongside me, even though I was the son of
Reviewle's chief.

289318.「おお トランブル将軍……\n わらわは何も おぬしら レビュール族を\n 悪く:
Oh, General Trumbull...I have no intention of
speaking ill about you or the Reviewle tribe.

289319.「ええ わかりますとも。レビュールも ゼドラも\n アシュレイ王が治める ゼドラ:
Yes, I know. Both the Reviewle and Zedra
tribes are under the banner of the Zedra
Kingdom's rule, led by you, King Ashley.

289320.「用向きは なんだ？: What business do you have here?

289321.「独立派に 動きが……。\n 皆 広間で お越しを待ってます。:
The Independents are on the move again...
Everyone is waiting for you in the hall.

289322.「あなたは 軍議があるのでしょう？\n お義母様の お相手なら 私が。:
You've got military business to attend to,
right? I'll stay and keep her company.

289323.「薬学の進歩は 目覚ましいものがあります。\n いつの日か レオーネの呪いも 解:
Our progress in medicine is quite remarkable.
Leone's curse will be lifted one day...
you'll see.

289324.「でも 大魔王の 呪いなのだろう？\n そんな すさまじいものを 消せるのかえ？:
But it's the Demon Lord's curse, is it not?
Can such a powerful thing be stopped?

289325.「私と夫は 大魔王ゴダに 打ち勝ちました。\n 呪いにも 必ずや 打ち勝ちます。:
My husband and I were able to defeat Goda,
so we will surely do the same in overcoming
the curse.

289326.「さあ お身体に さわります。\n そろそろ お部屋の方へ……。:
Now, let me help you. I think it's about time
to go back to your room...

289327.「あの やんちゃだった アシュレイが\n 国王に……。歳月は 人を変えますね。:
That mischievous Ashley became a king...
I suppose time really can change people.

289328.「一見 平和そうに見えますが\n どうにも きな臭い気がします。\n ……先を急:
At first glance, everything seems peaceful,
but something still doesn't feel right...
Let's continue on.

289329.「城下町で こうも立て続けに\n 暴動が起きようとは……。:
To have so many riots appearing in the castle
town one after another...it's unheard of.

289330.「組織立った動きに 見える。\n 何者かが 扇動しているようだな。:
It looks to be some kind of organized
movement. Someone must be inciting these
riots.

289331.「おお アシュレイ！\n 大変なことになったぞえ。: Oh, Ashley! We have a big problem!

289332.「母上！ お話なら のちほど。\n 今は 火急の時なのです。:
Mother! We'll have to talk later. The
situation is really urgent.

289333.「レオーネを いったい どこへやった？\n あの部屋から レオーネが いなくなっ:
Where did Leone go?! He's no longer in that
room! Did you move him somewhere?!

289335.「武器を手にした 暴徒たちが\n レビュールに国家を！ と叫びながら\n 城門前:
Armed rioters have gathered in the city
square, shouting "Reviewle as its own
country!" in front of the city's gate.

289336.「手勢を率いて 俺が出る。: I'll lead a force out there.

289337.「失礼ながら 陛下。\n おんみずからの ご出陣は 時期尚早かと。:
With all due respect, Your Majesty. I think
it's too early for you to be leading the
charge.

289338.「ええい！ トランブル将軍は まだか！\n 国家の 一大事ぞ！:
I agree! Where is General Trumbull?!
This is a matter of national scale!

289340.「神聖レビュール王国の\n 国王を名乗る者から 書状が届きました。:
I received a letter from someone claiming to
be king of the Sacred Kingdom of Reviewle.

289341.「勇者レオーネの像は 奪還した。レビュール族の\n 誇りたる レオーネを 城の置:
"We have recovered the statue of the Hero, Leone. As the pride of the Reviewle tribe, your actions of treating him as a mere
decoration in your castle have ignited our anger."

289342.「加えて レビュール族を ないがしろにし\n 国政の場から弾き出す 暗愚の王アシ:
"Furthermore, we shall unite as one to bring down the oppressive regime of Ashley, the foolish king, who neglects the Reviewle tribe
and purposefully excludes us from the political sphere."

289343.「神聖レビュール王国 初代国王……トランブル。:
Signed,
First King of the Sacred Kingdom of
Reviewle... Trumbull.

289344.「トランブルが 暴動の首謀者だと！？: Trumbull was the leader behind these riots?!

289345.「手の空いてる部隊を まとめて\n 広場を囲むように 配置しなおせ。\n なんと:
Take all available troops and have them
repositioned around the square. We must do
what we can to contain those rioters.

289346.「各部隊は 持ち場にて待機。\n 相手が暴徒でも こちらからは\n 絶対に 手を:
All units must stay at their posts on standby.
They must not show any aggression, even
towards the rioters.

289347.「……俺は どこで まちがえたんだ？\n 部族の統一など 夢物語だったのか！？:
Where did I go wrong...?
Was it just a fantasy to unite both tribes?!

289348.「弱気にならないで くださいまし。\n 大魔王を倒した あなたは\n どこへ い:
Please don't lose heart. What happened to the
man who defeated the Demon Lord?

289349.「あのときは 魔物や 魔族が相手だった。\n 今度の敵は 同じ人間だぞ。:
We were dealing with monsters and demons
back then. These are PEOPLE we are dealing
with!

289350.「なんと 弱気な！ 己の連れ合いが\n 弱者だと 感じることぐらい\n ゾッとす:
Such weakness! Is there anything more
chilling than knowing that your own
spouse could be so weak?

289351.「前向きに 考えるのです。\n 今こそ 盤石なる国家を作る またとない\n 機会:
You have to think positively. This is the one
chance to build a strong nation. We must bring
the hammer down hard on these traitors.

289352.「大魔王という 脅威が去った時代では\n 世を治め 民を導くのが 勇者の使命。\:
In times when the Demon Lord's threat
has passed, it's the Hero's duty to lead the
world and its people...no, it's your destiny!

289353.「せっかく 魔界からの侵略を 退けたのに……。\n 人間同士の争いを見ると 心が:
After having fought off the Demon World's
invasions...it pains me to see humans who
once joined hands fighting one another.

289354.「世の乱れこそ 英雄を生む 源泉と言えますが\n そこに生きる人たちにとっては:
While champions are borne from the chaos
of the world, it's those living in it who have
to suffer...

289355.「まだ 先があるようです。\n 心して進みましょう。:
It seems we've still a ways to go. Let's
continue on carefully.

289357.「死人が 出過ぎた。\n どちらかの王が 倒れるまで\n 決着は つくまいよ……:
Too many people have died. This cannot be
settled until one of us kings finally falls...

289358.「和平の道を 探るんだ。\n 俺たちの手で……。:
We have to find some way to make peace!
By our own hands...

289359.「和平だと？ 貴様は つくづく\n 統治者には 不向きなようだな。\n 問題の根:
Peace?! You truly are not suited to rule
anything! You don't even realize what the
root of all these problems are!

289360.「部族の統一を うたいながら ぬけぬけと\n 自分たちの名だけを 国名に残し……:
You shamelessly sing praises of the unity of our tribes, and yet the name of your nation is that of your own...how dare you!! How
dare you mock and belittle the Reviewle!

289361.「それに飽き足らず みずからを\n 唯一無二の 勇者であると 詐称することで\n:
And still you were not satisfied...so you tried to take the credit of defeating Goda all to yourself, claiming to be the one and only
Hero...

289362.「勇者レオーネを 盟友などという\n でっちあげの地位に おとしめることでな！:
...by belittling Leone's position as some
fabricated Ally!

289363.「勇者の片割れが 呪いで石と成り果て\n 大魔王に屈したなどという 不名誉。\n:
The disgrace of having the Hero's other half being cursed to stone and succumbing to the Demon Lord...we cannot allow that to be left
as a legacy for future generations!

289364.「へ理屈をこねるな！ 誰が納得するかッ！\n 火種は つねに くすぶっていた。\:
Don't try and argue with me! Who would possibly be convinced?! This spark was always smoldering! That is why you are
a foolish king!

289365.「頼む！ 剣をおろしてくれ！\n レオーネの義兄を 手にかけたくない！:
I'm begging you! Drop your sword! I will not
hurt Leone's adoptive brother!

289367.「レオーネを どこへやった！\n お前が 城から 盗み出したんだろ？:
What have you done with Leone?! You stole
him from the castle, didn't you?!

289369.「お帰りなさいませ。こたびの 反乱の鎮圧。\n 勇者アシュレイの 武勲として\n:
You've returned. Your heroic efforts have quelled the rebellion. The Hero Ashley shall be remembered for his valiant deeds for many
years to come.

289370.「レオーネを どこへやった？: What did you do with Leone?

289373.「トランブル将軍の 部下が\n 城内の 隠し部屋に移しました。:
Trumbull's men moved him to a hidden room
inside the castle.

289375.「遅かれ早かれ 彼らは 蜂起したでしょう。\n すべては 運命の導きだったのです:
Sooner or later they would have rebelled.
This was all guided by destiny.

289376.「国家の うみを出し切る よい機会でした。\n 多大な犠牲を 払いましたが 部族:
It was the perfect opportunity to snuff out the plague of this nation. A great price was paid...but we were able to expose and
eliminate those who clung dearly to their tribe.

289377.「これで ようやく 本当の意味での\n 部族の統一が かないましょう。\n 強き:
Now we may finally achieve true unity amongst
the tribes. And it is all thanks to your
incredible achievements, mighty king.

289378.「お…お前が 妻でなくば\n ひねり殺しているところだ。:
I...if you weren't my wife, I would be
wringing your neck right now!

289379.「自らが引き起こした 人間同士の殺しあい……。\n アシュレイの負の記憶は これ:
The fighting among fellow humans that was caused by his actions...so these were Ashley's painful memories. Even betrayed by his own
wife, too...how terrible...

289380.「アシュレイを 深い闇から\n 救い出してやりましょう！: Let's pull Ashley out of this deep darkness!

289381.「あなたが 転生の園に入るのは\n 初めてでしたね。ここは 天星郷で\n もっと:
This is your first time in the Reincarden,
right? This is the most sacred place in all
of the Firmament.

289382.「天寿を まっとうした 天使の魂は\n この花園の土に還り そして……\n 転生:
The souls of angels who fulfill their heavenly duties return to the soil in this garden...and then reside in these Rebirth Flowers, waiting
for the time of their reincarnation.

289383.「今を生きる 私たちの身体は\n 祖先の魂を受け継ぐ 器に過ぎない……。:
Our current bodies are nothing more than
vessels that carry the souls of our
ancestors...

289384.「と言っても 私をふくめ 誰も\n 前世の記憶なんて これっぽっちも\n 覚えて:
However, not a single person can remember
anything about their past lives...including
me.

289387.「……迷惑をかけて すまなかった。\n 二度と あのようなマネはせぬ。:
I'm sorry for everything I put you through...
I'll never do anything like that ever again.

289388.「もし また 正気を失い\n 暴れるようなことがあれば……そのときは\n ためら:
If I ever lose control and go on a rampage
like that again...please don't hesitate to
destroy me.

289390.「歩き回るくらいなら 大丈夫だ。\n 息抜きに この辺を出歩くことは\n 許され:
I'm fine so long as I just walk around. I'm
allowed to walk around here to relax, but
I'm not able to leave the Monastery.

289391.「……見ろ。同胞が 生まれるぞ。: Look there. There's a newborn coming.

289392.「お帰りなさい。我らが同胞 モシュネー。\n この時代 天星郷で出会えた よろこ:
Welcome home, my fellow Moshnay. May we revel
in the joy of meeting once again in the
Firmament of the present.

289393.「末永く すこやかであることを 願う。\n ルティアナ様の ご加護が あらんこと:
I wish you a long and healthy life. May the
blessings of Lutiana always be with you.

289394.「新生した天使は ああして\n 取り上げた者が 名付け親になる……。:
The newborn angel is named by the person
who takes them from the flower like that...
their benefactor.

289395.「私の名付け親は お姉様なんです。\n 大好きで 大切な名前です。:
My benefactor is Helvel here. I love and
cherish this name she gave to me.

289396.「勇敢であれと 天星郷に伝わる 勇士から\n 名前をもらったのだが……幼い頃のユ:
She was named after one of the Firmament's
bravest warriors...but when she was little,
she sure cried a lot at night...

289397.「お おやめください お姉様！\n この人の前で 本人も覚えてないような\n 昔:
P-please stop that! Saying those things I
can't even remember in front of them...

289399.「さて……息抜きは これくらいにするか。\n 近くに 私が療養に使っている 部屋:
Well...I think I'll take a break from this.
There's a room nearby that I can use to
rest.

289400.「込み入った話は そこでしよう。\n いろいろ 聞きたいことも あるだろう。:
I'll fill you in about everything there. I'm
sure you have many questions for me.

289402.「先代の勇者アシュレイには あなたという\n 盟友がいた……。でも ぼくには……:
You were the Ally of Ashley, the Hero before
me... But I have no Ally of my own to fight
beside me.

289403.「たった ひとりで 大魔王ヴァルザードを\n 倒せだなんて……できるわけないよ！:
How am I supposed to defeat the Demon Lord
Valzard by myself...? There's no way!

289404.「巫女の血をひく お母様は 神の預言を\n 授かったと はしゃいでいるけれど 何:
My mother is a maiden, and she was overjoyed
to receive a divine prophecy. But to force
everything onto just me...it's too much.

289405.「いまだに ぼくは 勇者のチカラに\n 目覚めていないのに……。: I still haven't awakened the Hero's power...

289406.「チカラがほしい！ 勇者のチカラが！\n ぼくだって 誰にも 死んでほしくない！:
I want that power! I NEED the Hero's power!
I don't want anyone to die!

289407.「ゼドラ王国の 王子として\n すべての民を 守りたい！:
As Zedra's prince, I want to protect all of
my people!

289408.「なんなんだ この光……。\n わきあがるような チカラを感じる。\n こ これ:
What is this light...? I feel a power welling
up inside of me... Could this be...the power
of the Hero?

289411.「あなたは もしや……レオーネなのですか？\n 大魔王ゴダの呪いで 石にされたと:
Are you, by chance...Leone? They say that you
were turned to stone by Goda's curse.

289412.「俺が 石に……？\n 大魔王ゴダの 呪いだと？: I was turned to stone...? By Goda's curse?

289413.「そうです。あなたは 勇者の盟友として\n 大魔王ゴダと 勇敢に戦いました。\n:
That's right. As the Hero's Ally, you fought
bravely against Goda. But because of the
curse he placed upon you...

289414.「ちょっと 待ってくれ。\n め…盟友？ なんだ それは…………。:
Hold on one second... A...ally? What is
that...?

289415.「今のは レオーネの過去……。\n 彼の石化を解いたのが 次代の勇者だとは\n:
So that was Leone's past...what a cruel twist
of fate that the next Hero was the one to
break his petrification...

289416.「いえ……考えるのは あとにして\n 今は 先を急ぎましょう。:
No...now's not the time to think about it.
Let's move on.

289417.「レオーネが処刑台に！？ いったい 何が……。\n 星導課の記録にも 記されてい:
Leone is about to be executed?! What is
happening...? None of the records in the
Celestial Division mention any of this!

289418.「聞けい！ 我が 臣民たちよ！: Hear ye, hear ye, my subjects!

289419.「大魔王ヴァルザードは 滅んだ！\n しかし 皆に愛された 勇者アジールは\n:
The Demon Lord Valzard has perished!
But Azir, the Hero beloved by all, returned
cold and lifeless.

289421.「大罪人レオーネが 殺害したからである！！:
For it was none other than Leone, the great
sinner, who murdered him!

289422.「この者は じつの兄である 勇者アシュレイを\n 憎悪していた。しかし 建国王の:
This man harbored hatred for his brother, Ashley the Hero. However, the era of the Founding King is long past...and there is
no way he could seek his revenge.

289423.「その晴らせぬ恨みを アシュレイの子孫たる\n 我が子 アジールに向けたのだ！:
And he directed that unavenged hatred towards
Ashley's descendant and my son, Azir!

289424.「卑怯にも 大魔王を討ち果たした 直後\n 満身創痍の 我が子を どさくさにまぎ:
After he slew the Demon Lord, he took advantage of the chaos, and heartlessly killed my wounded son! He falsely claims that Azir
died during the battle!

289426.「夜ごと 息子の霊が 枕元に立ち\n 無念を晴らしてくれと 母に訴えるのだ。:
Every night the spirit of my son stands by my
bedside, pleading his mother to end his
lingering regrets.

289427.「我が子の無念 今こそ 晴らそうぞ！\n ゼドラ王国 女王ゼーナピアの名において:
My child's vengeance shall now be avenged! In
the name of Queen Zenapia of Zedra, I sentence
the great sinner Leone be put to death!

289430.「私は 導きの天使。\n 英雄の魂を 天星郷へと導く者だ。:
I am an Angel of Guidance. It is my duty to
guide the souls of champions to the
Firmament.

289431.「生前の功績 および その資質が評価され\n そなたは 英雄と認められた。:
Your life's accomplishments and your qualities
have been recognized, which acknowledges
you as a champion.

289433.「そう。そなたは 死を迎えた。\n しかし 導きに応じれば 来たるべき日に\n:
Yes. You have met your end. However, if you
heed my guidance, a new body shall be bestowed
to you when the time is right.

289435.「もう このまま 消えたい……。\n 絶望と 憎悪にまみれた 人生だった。:
I just want to disappear... My life has been
filled with nothing but hatred and despair.

289436.「ならば なおのこと 英雄になるべきだ。: Then all the more reason to become a champion.

289437.「大魔王の呪いで 石にされたという 言い伝えを\n そなたは ずっと 疑問に思っ:
I'm sure you have long questioned the legend
about how you were turned to stone by the
Demon Lord's curse.

289438.「勇者に向けられた 大魔王の呪いであるならば\n なぜ 兄のアシュレイだけが 助:
If it was indeed their curse that targeted the
Hero, then why was only your brother spared?
Allow me to show you the truth...

289439.「……問題は 大魔王を討伐したあとじゃ。:
The problem is what happens after the Demon
Lord is defeated...

289440.「アシュレイを押し立てる ゼドラ族と\n レオーネを神輿と担ぐ レビュール族は\:
The Zedra, who support Ashley...and the
Reviewle, touting around Leone like some
palanquin...will likely clash once more.

289441.「お守りの中に 石と化す呪いの札を\n 仕込んでおいた。双子の勇者に 与えるのだ:
I placed a cursed tag on those charms
that turns its holder into stone. Give it to
the twin Heroes.

289442.「大魔王討伐後 御しやすい者を生かし\n そうでない者は……わかるな？:
After the Demon Lord is defeated, spare
the one who can be controlled easily. As for
the other...you understand, yes?

289443.「はい。私どもの望む 未来のため\n 争いの芽は 摘んでおくに限ります。:
I understand. For the future we desire, we
must nip these conflicts in the bud.

289445.「こ…こんなのは まぼろしだッ！\n 貴様は 天使でなく 悪魔だ！:
T...this can't real! You're no angel! You're
just some demon!

289446.「人類の 血で血をあがなう いとなみに\n 終止符を打ちたいとは 思わぬか？:
Do you not want to put an end to humanity's
endless cycle of bloodshed?

289447.「未来を生きる者たちが そなたのように\n 生まれてこなければ よかったなどと\:
We shall cleanse everything, so that those who
live in the future will not wish that they had
never been born...

289449.「いいや。かりそめの英雄となり\n ジア・クト念晶体を この世界に呼び寄せれば\:
Wrong. Become a temporary champion and bring
the Dia Kut Telecrystal to this world...only
then can it be achieved.

289451.「ジア・クトの 洗礼を受け入れよ。\n 世界を変えるのだ。人類を！ 文明を！\n:
Embrace Dia Kut's blessing. Change the world,
and raise humanity and civilization to heights
never thought possible.

289452.「こんな昔から ジア・クトに染められた\n 天使がいたなんて……。しかも レオー:
Who would've thought there had been an angel
tainted by Dia Kut for this long... Even Leone
had been poisoned from the very start.

289453.「なんという 途方もない たくらみなのか……。\n いえ。とにかく 今は\n 天:
What an unimaginable plan... No. We have to
hurry and get to the Archangel.

289454.「これが アストルティアの楯か……。\n 結界を解かせるのには 苦労したが\n:
So this is the Shield of Astoltia...it was quite the hassle to break that ward, but it seems my efforts were not in vain.
Hmm hmm hmm...

289455.「や…やめろ……楯に 触れるな……。\n 元に戻せ…………。:
S...stop it... Do not...touch that shield...
Put it...back...!

289456.「天使長！ あんたは 試練場を\n 見捨てるべきだったな。そうすりゃ\n こんな:
You should have just abandoned the trial areas, Archangel! If you had just done that, we wouldn't be in this situation right now,
would we?

289457.「おっと！ 下手なマネはするな。\n 今が どういう状況かは わかるな？:
Stop right there. Don't do anything rash.
You understand the situation, don't you?

289458.「<cs_pchero>。兄貴からも 聞いてるだろ？\n お前を 同志として迎え:
My brother told you, didn't he? I want you
to join me as my comradeーyou are the
Ally of the Hero, after all.

289459.「運命の巡りあわせか……人生で\n 二度も大魔王と戦ったが 理不尽な目にあい\n:
A horrible twist of fate, is it not? To fight the Demon Lord twice, only to face unjust circumstances and eventually be killed as
some kind of spectacle...

289460.「魔族でも 大魔王でもない。\n ほかならぬ 人間の手によってな！:
Not by demons, not by the Demon Lordー
but by none other than human hands!!

289461.「人間に 絶望したからと言って\n ジア・クトに くみしようなどと……。:
Just because you despair humanity, doesn't
mean you have to resort to siding with Dia
Kut...

289462.「黙れッ！ 俺が 生きていた時代と\n 何も変わっちゃいない！ いくら世代を\n:
SHUT UP! Not a single thing has changed since
I was alive! No matter how many generations
pass, humanity continues to act like children!

289463.「どだい 人が人を統治するのは\n 無理なんだよ。あまりに 未熟すぎてな！\n:
It's impossible for people to govern
themselves! They're just too immature! Which
is why I've bet everything on Dia Kut!

289464.「どうかしている！ 奴らは\n 祖先の故郷を蹂躙した 侵略者なんだぞ！\n そん:
What are you thinking?! They invaded and laid
waste to our ancestral homeland! What could
you possibly hope from such beings?!

289465.「侵略であっても 平和のうちに統治されるなら\n それでよし……。逆に 滅ぼされ:
If it's an invasion, it's fine so long as it leads to peaceful rule... On the other hand, if they destroy us, then no one will have to
live a life filled with misery any longer.

289466.「さあ 俺の同志になってくれ。 \n この世界に ジア・クト念晶体を招こう。<y:
Come, let us be comrades. Together, we can
invite the Dia Kut Telecrystal to this world.<yesno><close>

289467.「こころざしを ひとつにできて うれしいよ。\n やはり 勇者の盟友たる 俺たち:
It's heartening that we share the same
purpose. As Hero and Ally, it seems we had
a connection from deep within...

289468.「正気か！？ 英雄たる者の 選択ではない！\n 何もかも捨てて お前は 本当に\:
Are you insane?! That is not something that a
champion would choose! Are you really going
to give up everything and join with a fiend?!<yesno><close>

289469.「……同志には ならない。\n それが お前の答えか。残念でならないよ。:
...So you don't want to be my comrade.
That is your answer? How disappointing.

289470.「当代の 勇者の盟友である お前に\n 親近感を 抱いていたんだがな。\n どう:
I've felt a certain closeness with you, as you
are an Ally yourself. But I suppose those
feelings were just one-sided...

289472.「神殿の結界を 解かせるため\n 中心核のエネルギーを 奪取してきたのは\n そ:
Their purpose in siphoning the energy from
the central cores wasn't just to break the
ward of this temple.

289473.「この莫大なエネルギーを 暴発させれば\n いかに 創世の女神の 秘宝といえど\:
If this enormous energy is released, then even
a treasure of the Goddess of Creation can
be smashed to pieces...

289474.「フフフ……あーっはははは！\n お前たちに 新たなる世界を 見せてやろう！:
Hmm hmm hmm...Ah hahahahaha!
Allow me to show you all a new world!

289475.「ジア・クト念晶体よ！！\n アストルティアは ここだ！\n 俺たちは ここにい:
Dia Kut Telecrystal!
Astoltia is here! WE are here!

289476.<center>見つけたぞ！ ゆりかごの末裔！: We've found you, Descendants of the Cradle!

289477.<center>探していた。永遠とも思える\n停滞の中で お前たちを！:
Amidst what seemed like an eternity of
nothing, we have been searching for you.

289479.「ゆりかごの末裔よ！\n 侵略する！ 貴様らの世界をッ！\n 我ら ジア・クト念:
Descendants of the Cradle! We shall invade and
your world will belong to us, for we are the
Dia Kut Telecrystal!

289480.「お前が ジア・クト念晶体なのか……。: So you are the Dia Kut Telecrystal...

289481.「肯定する。私は ジア・ルミナ。\n ジア・クト念晶体の ひとかけら。:
Affirmative. I am Dia Lumina, and am but
a fragment of the Dia Kut Telecrystal.

289482.「座標を 公開したのは お前か？\n 突然 この世界が 見つけやすくなった。\n:
The one who provided coordinates, it was
you? This world suddenly became so easy to
locate. It's as if the haze finally lifted...

289483.「ンフ<heart> 感じる。\n お前から ジア・クトの因子を。:
Heh heh... <heart> We can feel it...
The traits of Dia Kut within you.

289484.「では ジア・ルミナよ。\n できそこないの人類を 導いてくれ。:
Then by all means, Dia Lumina. Guide our
humanity of imperfection.

289485.「服従せよ ジア・クトに。\n さすれば 同胞として 歓迎す。:
Submit yourself to Dia Kut, and you shall be
welcomed as one of our own.

289486.「ただし 敵意には 容赦せぬ！\n ジア・クトへ 向けられる 敵意には！:
But we will not tolerate insolence! Insolence
towards Dia Kut will be shown no mercy!

289487.「ふ…ふるえが止まらん。\n 祖先より 受け継がれし 恐怖なのか……。:
I...I can't stop shaking. Is this the same
fear our ancestors felt..?

289488.「祖先の仇にして 人類の敵です。\n 戦いましょう <cs_pchero>！:
They are the enemy of our ancestors and all
of humanity. We must fight them,
<cs_pchero>!

289489.「非礼を 詫びよう。\n あなどっていた。軟弱な 生命体と。:
We apologize for any offense. It seems we've
underestimated you fragile lifeforms.

289490.「ンフ<heart> すみやかに 排除すべきか。\n 侵略の 障害となりうる要素:
Hmm...<heart> Shall we promptly eliminate
you? We must for any element that may be an
obstacle to our invasion.

289491.「あのオーラ……まさか 呪炎！？: That aura...could it be the cursed flame?!

289492.「<cs_pchero>！ 神剣を使って！\n 奴に 効くかもしれません！:
<cs_pchero>! Use the sword!
It might just work on her!

289493.「神剣ならば ジア・クトに対抗できる……。: With the divine sword, we can beat Dia Kut...!

289494.「よくも キズを……私の念晶体に！: My telecrystal...how dare you scratch it!

289495.「神剣で 鎖を断て！\n 今なら あの船を 追い返せるかもしれん！:
Use the sword to break the chain! It might be
our only chance to drive the ship away!

289496.「貸せ。鎖は 私が断つ！\n お前は 天使長の加勢を頼む！:
Give it to me! I will break the chain!
You go and help the Archangel!

289497.「神剣よ！ 怨敵から 世界を守るため\n 秘めたるチカラを 今 解き放て！:
O divine blade! Release your hidden power now,
so that you may protect the world from its
most dangerous enemy!

289500.「砕いたのか……。我が船の錨を。:
The anchor of our ship...you have shattered
it.

289502.「ジア・クトは 異なる世界の境界をも\n 乗り越える すぐれた種族だ。\n 人類:
Dia Kut are remarkable beings that transcend
the boundaries of many worlds. You will be
the salvation of humanity.

289503.「招待しよう。我が船に。今より お前は\n ジア・クト念晶体の ひとかけらだ。:
To our ship, I invite you. Henceforth, a
fragment of the Dia Kut Telecrystal you are.

289505.<cs_pchero>は 動こうとしないユーライザを\n立ち上がらせ とこしえの:
<cs_pchero> helped the reluctant Yuliza
up on her feet, and the two left the Temple
of Eternity.

289698.「まあまあ ふたりとも。よく 来てくれたわね。\n 話は 天使長から まるっと聞:
Well, well! I'm glad the both of you could come. The Archangel's already told me everything, so I went ahead and prepared
the Wonderwing for you!

289699.「じゃじゃ～ん！ これが 聖天のつばさです。\n なんと 下界の人でも すぐさま:
Ta-daaaah! This is the Wonderwing. Even if
you come from the lower world, this will
allow to freely soar the skies!

289700.「もとは ケガをして 飛べなくなった天使を\n 補助するための 乗り物なんだけど:
It was originally designed as a vehicle to help any angels who became injured and unable to fly, but I'm sure you'll have no
problem using it, too!

289701.「と……その前に リオンネちゃん。\n あのジュースを <pc>さんに\n 渡し:
Oh...before that, Rionne. Please give the
juice to <pc>, won't you?

289703.「それは 私が作った 特製ドリンク。\n フェディーラ印の ふわふわジュースよ～:
It's a special drink I made myself. I call it
Fedira's Floaty Juice!

289704.「飲めば たちまち 大気にふくまれる霊子を\n 見られるようになります。霊子が何:
Drink that, and you'll be able to see the spirit specks floating all around! Let's put aside what that means for just a
moment, so go ahead! Drink up!

289706.「おほほ……さっそく 霊子の流れが\n 見えるように なったみたいね～。それこそ:
Ohoho...that look means you can now see the
spirit specks floating around! And that means
you can now handle using the Wonderwing!

289707.「聖天のつばさは ドル…ボード？ に\n 取り付けることも できるのよ。\n さ:
The Wonderwing can be attached to a Dol...
board? Go on, give it a try!

289708.<pc>は 聖天のつばさ（だいじなもの）と\nドルボードプリズムを 手に入れた！:
<pc> received the
Wonderwing (Key Item) and Dolboard Prism!
Your Dolboard changed into the Wonderwing!<me 60>

289709.「ステキです！ あなたと共に 天星郷の空を\n 飛べるようになるなんて……夢のよ:
Amazing! To be able to fly with you in the
skies of the Firmament...it's like a dream
come true.

289711.「浮くには 浮いたけれど\n 今のを 飛んだとは 言い難いわね～。\n 天使と下:
You can float, but I really wouldn't call
that FLYING... I wonder if angels and those
from the lower world handle it differently?

289712.「霊子が見えるなら 聖天のつばさを介して\n 自然と その流れに乗ることが\n:
If you can see the specks of spirit, then you
should be able to fly naturally with the
Wonderwing.

289713.「特に この深翠の試練場は 大気にふくまれる\n 霊子の量が豊富だから 天星郷の:
Especially here in this trial, the amount of specks in the atmosphere is so abundant, it's by far the easiest place in the Firmament
to fly.

289714.「でも ここで 浮くのが やっとなら\n 天星郷の他の場所では 霊子を見ることす:
But if you could barely float here, then you
might not be able to see the spirit specks
anywhere else!

289715.「それは……<pc>は\n 深翠の試練場 以外の場所では\n 飛べないということ:
So, does that mean...<pc>
can't fly anywhere but here in the Deep
Green Trial?

289716.「そうなるわね。でも 安心して～！\n 追加で もう１杯 ふわふわジュースを飲め:
It seems that way...but worry not! Drink one
more bottle of Floaty Juice, and your ability
to see the specks should greatly improve!

289717.「リオンネちゃ～ん！\n ふわふわ もう１杯 プリーズ！:
Oh, Riooooonne! One more Floaty, if you
please!

289718.「さっきのが 最後の１杯です。\n お忘れでしたか？ フェディーラ様……。: That was the last one...did you forget?

289719.「まっ！ なんということでしょう……。\n 長らく ふるまう機会が なかったせい:
Oh! I didn't even think about that...it's been
so long since I've been able to actually serve
it, so I completely forgot how much I had!

289720.「こ このままでは 紺碧の試練場の\n 創世のピラーに たどり着けません……。\:
A...at this rate we'll never get to the Pillar
of Creation in the Azure Trial...
We have to find another way...

289721.「あらあら そんなカオしないの～。切らした物は\n 作ればいいのよ。あなたには:
Now, now, no need for that face! If we run
out of something, we can just make more!
I'll need a liiiiittle help from you, though.

289722.「今すぐ 紺碧の試練場に 行きたいところですが\n 急がば回れとも 言いますし:
I'd like to go to the Azure Trial as soon as
we can, but "slow and steady wins the race",
as they say. Let's follow Fedira's lead here.

289723.「お手伝いの内容と 聖天のつばさの扱い方を\n このあと くわしく説明しますので:
I'll explain more about how you can help me
and how to handle the Wonderwing, so please
speak to me again.

290504.「その楯には 世界を変えるチカラがあると\n アシュレイから 聞きました。:
Ashley said that shield has the power to
change the world.

291259.「<pc>を 四天の星巡りに参加させぬよう\n 裏で 悪評を流したりしたのも そ:
As for spreading the rumors to keep from undergoing the Four Heavenly Trials, well...my scheming started
long before that.

297187.「にが～い お薬みたいな 味がすると思って\n 飲むのを ためらっているのかしら:
What's wrong? You don't wanna drink it 'cause
you think it'll taste like bitter medicine!
Don't worry! I promise it tastes fine!

297190.「……そんな言い方 しないでください。\n でも その おっしゃりよう……いかに:
Please don't say things like that...but the
fact you did say it...you sound just like your
old self. That's a relief.

297191.「終わったら 天使長の間へ 報告に来い。:
When you are finished, report to me in the
Archangel's office.

297192.「レクタ鉱石の 必要な数は ４個だ。\n 採石バッグに入れて ここへ 戻ってきて:
We'll need four pieces of that ore. Put them
into that Quarry Bag and then return here.

297193.「禁忌が 禁忌でなくなる。\n まさか こんな日が来るなんて……。:
I never thought the day would come when the
forbidden would no longer be just that...

297194.「取り返しの つかないことをしてッ！\n まだ 罪をかさねるつもりか！:
You have irreversibly doomed us all! And yet
you still intend on committing more misdeeds?!

297195.「我が命を吸い 万物を砕く 刃に変えろ！:
Take my life, and become a blade that severs
all!
